method.name: Evolutionary Feature Selection for fuzzy Rough set based Prototype Selection

reference.ref: J. Derrac, N. Verbiest, S. Garcia, C. Cornelis, F. Herrera, On the use of Evolutionary Feature Selection for Improving Fuzzy Rough Set Based Prototype Selection. Soft Computing 17:2 (2013) 223-238.

generalDescription.type: Rough Set and Evolutionary based learning algorithm
generalDescription.howWork: EFS_RPS is a hybrid method for prototype selection (based on Fuzzy Rough Set theory) and feature selection (using a Steady-State Genetic Algorithm). Both preprocessing techniques are applied to obtain different reduced training sets, which are improved throughout the search in a wrapper-like way.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN classifier.
SizePop: Size of the population of the genetic algorithm.
MaxEvaluations: Maximum number of evaluations in the genetic algorithm.
Beta: Beta balancing parameter of the fitness function.
MutProb: Mutation probability of the genetic algorithm, per bit
Cycle: Lenght of each cycle of EFS_RPS (evaluations)
Implicator: Type of implicator used by the instance selection wrapper.
Tnorm: Type of tnorm used by the instance selection wrapper.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: EFS_RPS-C Dataset: iris Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.039999999999999994 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.04422166387140534 Correctly classified: 0.96 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Summary of data, Classifiers: iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.9481481481481482 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9481481481481482 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9555555555555556 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.04 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.008248539796785217 Correctly classified: 0.96 Global N/C: 0.0
